page.title: 02Southwell Today
page.content: I think{Southwell}is a lovely town. It is in a convenient setting.{Newark, {Mansfield}and{Nottingham}aren't too far away.Also you can go to{Sherwood {Forest,Rufford}or{Clumber Park}without too long a drive. The shops are convenient too.We have a Co-op, a sweet shop and plenty of good clothes shops. We have several newsagents, a cobblers and a shoeshop. There are two Infant Schools, a Junior School and a Senior School.{The Leisure Centre}is good. There is a swimming pool, a big hall and a bar. We have ten pubs in {Southwell. They}are{The Wheatsheaf, {The Crown, The Reindeer, The Rodney, {The Hearty Goodfellow, The Bramley {Apple, The White Lion, The Saracen's {Head}(also a hotel),{The Admiral {Nelson}and The{Newcastle Arms.}The {Minster}is our town's main attraction. It is a very old church.
